curam.common.util.xml.dom.transform

Class DOMSource

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.xml.transform.sax.SAXSource
      • org.dom4j.io.DocumentSource
        • curam.common.util.xml.dom.transform.DOMSource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javax.xml.transform.Source

    public class DOMSource
extends org.dom4j.io.DocumentSource
    A DOMSource implements a JAXP SAXSource for a Document. This implementation extends a dom4j DocumentSource.
